description: Golden file metadata for TA-Lib reference comparisons
notes: These are TA-Lib reference values for comparison testing (PRD 7.4)
Discrepancies are informational only and do not block releases
Use --features reference-checks-strict to treat divergences as errors
- Stochastic: TA-Lib returns 0 when h==l, fast-ta returns 50 per PRD spec
- Minor floating-point differences may occur due to different operation ordering
